flavorText: Good help is hard to dig up.

foreignData.name: Flaches Grab
foreignData.text: Bringe die oberste Kreaturenkarte aus Deinem Friedhof direkt ins Spiel, als ob sie gerade gesprochen worden wäre. Für diese Kreatur gilt die Einsatzverzögerung nicht. Entferne diese Kreatur am Ende des Zuges ganz aus dem Spiel.

name: Shallow Grave
originalText: Put the top creature card from your graveyard into play as though it were just played. That creature is unaffected by summoning sickness. Remove the creature from the game at end of any turn.

rulings.text: Only exiles the creature if the creature is still on the battlefield at the beginning of the end step.

text: Return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
